title: Hollyoaks spoilers: James and Grace filled with hate as Mercedes is shot
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Mercedes McQueen (Jennifer Metcalfe) is set to be the victim of a shooting in upcoming Hollyoaks episodes, but — prior to this incident — she becomes public enemy number one when the truth about the hit-and-run is finally revealed — and James Nightingale (Gregory Finnegan) and Grace Black (Tamar Wall) are particularly upset to discover what Mercedes did.

It’s a sad day in the village, as Harry’s (Parry Glasspool) funeral arrives, and Diane (Alex Fletcher) is concerned that nobody will show up as many of the villagers still hold him responsible for Grace’s accident. However Mercedes wastes little time in consoling her.

Meanwhile, with James still the prime suspect in his boyfriend’s murder, he sets out to discover the truth, but little does he know the information he’s about to become party to later in the day.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Elsewhere, having learned the truth, Grace makes her way to The Dog — where the villagers have congregated after Harry’s funeral — and takes to the stage. She proceeds to play Mercedes’ confession aloud for all those in attendance to hear.

Mercedes — and the entire village, for that matter — is left devastated by the revelation. Several villagers turn on Mercedes — including James, who begins to think that she might’ve had a hand in Harry’s death.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Later in the week, an emotional Mercedes heads to The Loft after an argument ensues.

While there, she heads onto the dance floor, and dances the night away. However, disaster strikes as someone picks up the nearby gun and shoots her —leaving her to die.

With James and Grace having demonstrated how much they dislike Mercedes over her actions, could either one of them perhaps be the culprits?

They’re certainly among the suspects, but are either of them capable of carrying out such a heinous act?

What’s more, will Mercedes live to find out who’s responsible?

One to watch: Friday 1st November at 7pm on E4.

description: Mercedes makes quite a few enemies in one day — two of which are Grace and James.
